verses.roman:
kevala nīlācale prabhura ye ye bhakta-gaṇa
saṅkṣepe kariye kichu se saba kathana

synonyms: kevala—only; nīlācale—in Jagannātha Purī; prabhura—of the Lord; ye ye—all those; bhakta-gaṇa—devotees; saṅkṣepe—in brief; kariye—I do; kichu—some; se saba—all those; kathana—narration.
translation: Let me briefly describe some of the devotees of Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu in Jagannātha Purī.
